channel.title: Server won't run for others
channel.description:
This has happened to multiple others, here is what it says when they run the client:
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError: Jframe : Unsu pported major.minor version 51.0 at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClassCond(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$000(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: Jframe. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
This is the code inside run.bat:
[code]@echo off title Running Valacity 317. "C:/Program Files (x86)/Java/Jre6/bin/java.exe" -Xmx300m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32 pause[/code]
Can someone please give me a code that works on 32bit, 64bit, windows7, or w.e. it needs to work on?

item.title: Server won't run for others
item.dc:creator: @Vexillum Vexillum
item.description:
@Vexillum wrote:

I’m going to have a webclient soon, but I’m having problems with that also. I just need to obtain all the codes and put them all in the client so everyone can run it. Also, thanks a lot for trying to help.

Read full topic

item.title: Server won't run for others
item.dc:creator: @Resent Resent
item.description:
@Resent wrote:

[quote=“Vexillum, post:5, topic:431158”]It still doesn’t work…

I don’t know why. His java is in Program Files and I’ve edited it and re uploaded for him like 5 times. Is there any code that will work for 32bit, 64bit, windows 7, and everything else? I really need this fixed because other people have this problem too.[/quote]

Unfortunately, there isn’t a code that works with all Java types. Run.bat codes vary from what Windows OS you’re running off of, what Java version you have, etc. The only way to guarantee that your client will work with all Windows OS is to .jar the file. You can find the tutorial on how to do that here:
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CiDQ7igB6fk[/youtube]

Read full topic

item.title: Server won't run for others
item.dc:creator: @Vexillum Vexillum
item.description:
@Vexillum wrote:

It still doesn’t work…

I don’t know why. His java is in Program Files and I’ve edited it and re uploaded for him like 5 times. Is there any code that will work for 32bit, 64bit, windows 7, and everything else? I really need this fixed because other people have this problem too.

Read full topic

item.title: Server won't run for others
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“Resent, post:3, topic:431158”][quote author=Vexillum link=topic=533837.msg3902526#msg3902526 date=1327887084]
This has happened to multiple others, here is what it says when they run the client:

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError: Jframe : Unsu pported major.minor version 51.0 at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClassCond(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$000(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: Jframe. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .

This is the code inside run.bat:

@echo off title Running Valacity 317. "C:/Program Files (x86)/Java/Jre6/bin/java.exe" -Xmx300m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32 pause

Can someone please give me a code that works on 32bit, 64bit, windows7, or w.e. it needs to work on?
[/quote]

They most likely don’t have windows 7. Just create another file called “run2.bat” and put this inside of it.

@echo off title Running Valacity 317. "C:/Program Files/Java/Jre6/bin/java.exe" -Xmx300m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32 pause

The people your allowing client access to, most likely don’t have Windows 7, therefore they only have a “Program Files” not a “Program Files (x86),” so the error is claiming that it is unable to locate the current java version for your client.

Hopefully I helped![/quote]
repped you

Read full topic

item.title: Server won't run for others
item.dc:creator: @Resent Resent
item.description:
@Resent wrote:

[quote=“Vexillum, post:1, topic:431158”]This has happened to multiple others, here is what it says when they run the client:

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError: Jframe : Unsu pported major.minor version 51.0 at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClassCond(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$000(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: Jframe. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .

This is the code inside run.bat:

@echo off title Running Valacity 317. "C:/Program Files (x86)/Java/Jre6/bin/java.exe" -Xmx300m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32 pause

Can someone please give me a code that works on 32bit, 64bit, windows7, or w.e. it needs to work on?[/quote]

They most likely don’t have windows 7. Just create another file called “run2.bat” and put this inside of it.

@echo off title Running Valacity 317. "C:/Program Files/Java/Jre6/bin/java.exe" -Xmx300m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32 pause

The people your allowing client access to, most likely don’t have Windows 7, therefore they only have a “Program Files” not a “Program Files (x86),” so the error is claiming that it is unable to locate the current java version for your client.

Hopefully I helped!

Read full topic
